title: When I am about to join a match the game crashes.
body:
When it crashes it states, 
"BsSndRpt
expected argument 'c'

replies.body:
It sounds like this could be caused by corrupted files or permissions issues. As a first step, I recommend running a full repair of your game files with [this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5).

Let me know if this caused any change.
I am unable to even open the application without the expected argument c to pop up so I am unable to repair the files...
